Staff, rare (requires attunement by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard)
This is a graceful, highly polished wooden staff crafted from willow. A crystal ball tops the staff, and smooth gold bands twist around its shaft. This staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC: @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.q3ggx5aH69iqrcL3]{detect thoughts} (2 charges), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.wAusgnQGjgl6QPD3]{locate creature} (4 charges), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.wAusgnQGjgl6QPD3]{locate object} (2 charges), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.GRLnRMB9C9gU2PHq]{scrying} (5 charges), or @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.ucOdaPECcXApN7hF]{true seeing} (6 charges).
The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, a bright flash of light erupts from the crystal ball, and the staff vanishes.
